description:
Conan, Ran, Kogoro are joined by Heiji and Kazuha visiting from Osaka at the Suzuki Museum. Meanwhile, Kid has announced that he intends to steal the world`s largest conch pearl on display at the museum known as the Fairy Lip. He disguises himself as Kazuha and infiltrates the exhibition room. He seems to have successfully stolen the gemstone, but...?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kid contre Kômei: les lèvres prises pour cible (2e partie)
Kid vs. Komei: The Targeted Lips (Part 2)
كيد ضد كومي: الشفاه المستهدفة (الجزء الثاني)
キッドVS高明 狙われた唇 (後編)
키드 vs 코메이 목표가 된 입술 (후편)
